name: Queen's Gambit (n_nexy)
description:
An endless onslaught of evil pawns is eager to commit some regicide! 

Use the mouse to drag the Queen across the chessboard, slay the enemies and protect your King as long as possible!

This game was created in 3 hours  (More like around 4...oh, well) for #185 Trijam (https://itch.io/jam/trijam-185), following the theme: "Kings and Queens"

CREDITS:

Sound Effects where created using Chiptone
(https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone)

Music by HorrorPen
(https://opengameart.org/content/gray-trip
